label: Generate PDF (pdf-generator)
name: generatePDFPdfGenerator
description: This flow step will allow you to generate PDFs using the pdf-generator service

inputs.label: Template
inputs.name: template
inputs.description: HTML template to be converted to PDF

inputs.label: Data
inputs.name: data
inputs.description: Data to be used in the template

inputs.label: Settings
inputs.name: settings
inputs.description: Settings to be used to convert the template to PDF

inputs.label: Callback Data
inputs.name: callbackData
inputs.description: This is an object you can send that you will get back when the function is processed

inputs.label: Callbacks
inputs.name: callbacks
inputs.description: This is a map where you can listener for different function
